abstract: The company’s founder responds to reader comments in a follow-up to last week’s case study. Is it wrong to look at a candidate’s Facebook page?
snippet: The company’s founder responds to reader comments in a follow-up to last week’s case study. Is it wrong to look at a candidate’s Facebook page?
lead_paragraph: The case study we published last week chronicled the efforts of OfficeDrop, a start-up that scans sensitive documents for its clients and therefore must ensure that employees are trustworthy.

headline.main: What OfficeDrop Learned About Background Checks
